name: Logistic map (r = 2.8)
description_simple: A discrete-time nonlinear map on [0, 1] that converges to a stable fixed point when the parameter r is 2.8.
description_complex: A deterministic one-dimensional iterated map in a parameter regime where trajectories converge to a single stable fixed point. There is no sensitive dependence on initial conditions, the largest Lyapunov exponent is non-positive, and long-term behavior is easily predictable.
